title: Create a route
agreeText: By confirming, you agree that you are fully responsible for the route. The voom platform is not a carrier and is not responsible for the actions of drivers or passengers.
importantText: voom recommends drivers to register as self-employed to avoid issues with regulatory authorities. Registration takes a few minutes and is available via <link>my.gov.uz</link>
bannerText: Scan the QR code and use all features directly from your phone.
